item.title: Assessing The Marketing Effects of Randomization Failure
item.description:
Preface

I always enjoy reading when technical people share their stories of the times things went a little haywire. Times when, despite their best intentions, a solution didn't work as planned and it ends in unpleasant or catastrophic failure. I had an experience like this recently, so here's my "oops â€¦
